mutants.code:
def xor_binary_numbers(num1, num2):
    n = max(len(num1), len(num2))
    num1 = num1.zfill(n)
    num2 = num2.zfill(n)
    num1 = int(num1, 2)
    num2 = int(num2, 2)
    xor_result = num1 | num2
    xor_binary = bin(xor_result)[2:].zfill(n)
    xor_list = [int(bit) for bit in xor_binary]
    return xor_list
